00078 int BSP_BccDeInit( void )
00079 {
00080   /* Reset counters */
00081   rxByteCount = 0xFFFFFFFFUL;
00082   txByteCount = 0xFFFFFFFFUL;
00083 
00084   BSP_BccPinsEnable( false );
00085 
00086 #if defined( BSP_BCC_LEUART )
00087   /* Reset LEUART */
00088   LEUART_Reset( BSP_BCC_LEUART );
00089 #else
00090   /* Reset USART */
00091   USART_Reset( BSP_BCC_USART );
00092 #endif
00093 
00094   /* Disable clock */
00095   CMU_ClockEnable( BSP_BCC_CLK, false );
00096 
00097   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00098 }

00100 /**************************************************************************/
00106 int BSP_BccInit( void )
00107 {
00108 #if defined( BSP_BCC_LEUART )
00109   LEUART_Init_TypeDef leuartInit = LEUART_INIT_DEFAULT;
00110 #else
00111   USART_InitAsync_TypeDef usartInit = USART_INITASYNC_DEFAULT;
00112 #endif
00113 
00114   rxByteCount = 0;
00115   txByteCount = 0;
00116 
00117   /* Enable High Frequency Peripherals */
00118   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_HFPER, true);
00119 
00120   /* Enable clocks to GPIO */
00121   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_GPIO, true);
00122 
00123   /* Enable UART clock */
00124   CMU_ClockEnable( BSP_BCC_CLK, true );
00125 
00126 #if defined( BSP_BCC_LEUART )
00127   /* Enable CORE LE clock in order to access LE modules */
00128   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_CORELE, true);
00129 
00130   /* Select CORE LE clock for LE modules */
00131   CMU_ClockSelectSet( cmuClock_LFB, cmuSelect_CORELEDIV2 );
00132 
00133    /* Initialize LEUART */
00134    leuartInit.baudrate = 115200;
00135    LEUART_Init( BSP_BCC_LEUART, &leuartInit );
00136 #else
00137   /* Initialize USART */
00138   USART_InitAsync( BSP_BCC_USART, &usartInit );
00139 #endif
00140 
00141   /* Initialize UART pins */
00142   BSP_BccPinsEnable( true );
00143 
00144   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00145 }

00147 /**************************************************************************/
00154 bool BSP_BccPacketReceive( BCP_Packet *pkt )
00155 {
00156   int i;
00157   int length;
00158   uint8_t *bptr;
00159 
00160   /* Setup a byte pointer to start of packet buffer */
00161   bptr   = (uint8_t *) pkt;
00162 
00163   /* Receive packet magic */
00164   *bptr++ = RxByte();
00165   if (pkt->magic != BSP_BCP_MAGIC)
00166   {
00167      return false;
00168   }
00169 
00170   /* Receive packet type */
00171   *bptr++ = RxByte();
00172   if ( (pkt->type < BSP_BCP_FIRST) || (pkt->type > BSP_BCP_LAST) )
00173   {
00174      return false;
00175   }
00176 
00177   /* Receive packet length */
00178   *bptr++ = RxByte();
00179   if (pkt->payloadLength > BSP_BCP_PACKET_SIZE)
00180   {
00181      return false;
00182   }
00183 
00184 #if ( BSP_BCP_VERSION == 2 )
00185    /* Receive reserved byte */
00186    *bptr++ = RxByte();
00187 #endif
00188 
00189   /* Receive packet data length field and sanity check it */
00190   length  = pkt->payloadLength;
00191   if (length > BSP_BCP_PACKET_SIZE)
00192   {
00193      length = BSP_BCP_PACKET_SIZE;
00194   }
00195 
00196   /* Receive packet payload */
00197   for( i=0; i<length; i++ )
00198   {
00199      *bptr++ = RxByte();
00200   }
00201 
00202   return true;
00203 }
00204 
00205 /**************************************************************************/
00212 int BSP_BccPacketSend( BCP_Packet *pkt )
00213 {
00214   int i;
00215 
00216   /* Apply magic */
00217   pkt->magic = BSP_BCP_MAGIC;
00218 
00219   /* Transmit packet magic */
00220   TxByte( pkt->magic );
00221 
00222   /* Transmit packet type */
00223   TxByte( pkt->type );
00224 
00225   /* Transmit packet length */
00226   TxByte( pkt->payloadLength );
00227 
00228 #if ( BSP_BCP_VERSION == 2 )
00229   /* Transmit reserved byte */
00230   TxByte( pkt->reserved );
00231 #endif
00232 
00233   /* Transmit packet payload */
00234   for ( i=0; i<pkt->payloadLength; i++ )
00235   {
00236     TxByte( pkt->data[i] );
00237   }
00238 
00239   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00240 }

00242 /**************************************************************************/
00247 void BSP_BccPinsEnable( bool enable )
00248 {
00249   if (enable)
00250   {
00251     /* Configure GPIO pin for UART TX */
00252     /* To avoid false start, configure output as high. */
00253     GPIO_PinModeSet( BSP_BCC_TXPORT, BSP_BCC_TXPIN, gpioModePushPull, 1 );
00254 
00255     /* Configure GPIO pin for UART RX */
00256     GPIO_PinModeSet( BSP_BCC_RXPORT, BSP_BCC_RXPIN, gpioModeInput, 1 );
00257 
00258     /* Enable the switch that enables UART communication. */
00259     GPIO_PinModeSet( BSP_BCC_ENABLE_PORT, BSP_BCC_ENABLE_PIN, gpioModePushPull, 1 );
00260 
00261     #if defined( BSP_BCC_LEUART )
00262       BSP_BCC_LEUART->ROUTE |= LEUART_ROUTE_RXPEN | LEUART_ROUTE_TXPEN | BSP_BCC_LOCATION;
00263     #else
00264       BSP_BCC_USART->ROUTE |= USART_ROUTE_RXPEN | USART_ROUTE_TXPEN | BSP_BCC_LOCATION;
00265     #endif
00266   }
00267   else
00268   {
00269     GPIO_PinModeSet( BSP_BCC_ENABLE_PORT, BSP_BCC_ENABLE_PIN, gpioModeDisabled, 0 );
00270 
00271     #if defined( BSP_BCC_LEUART )
00272       BSP_BCC_LEUART->ROUTE &= ~(LEUART_ROUTE_RXPEN | LEUART_ROUTE_TXPEN);
00273     #else
00274       BSP_BCC_USART->ROUTE &= ~(USART_ROUTE_RXPEN | USART_ROUTE_TXPEN);
00275     #endif
00276 
00277     GPIO_PinModeSet( BSP_BCC_TXPORT, BSP_BCC_TXPIN, gpioModeDisabled, 0 );
00278 
00279     GPIO_PinModeSet( BSP_BCC_RXPORT, BSP_BCC_RXPIN, gpioModeDisabled, 0 );
00280   }
00281 }
00282 
00285 static uint8_t RxByte( void )
00286 {
00287   uint8_t byte;
00288 
00289   /* Poll RX data available flag and return a character when one is available */
00290 
00291 #if defined( BSP_BCC_LEUART )
00292   while (!(BSP_BCC_LEUART->IF & LEUART_IF_RXDATAV)) ;
00293   byte = BSP_BCC_LEUART->RXDATA;
00294 #else
00295   while (!(BSP_BCC_USART->STATUS & USART_STATUS_RXDATAV)) ;
00296   byte = BSP_BCC_USART->RXDATA;
00297 #endif
00298 
00299   rxByteCount++;
00300   return byte;
00301 }
00302 
00303 static void TxByte( uint8_t data )
00304 {
00305   /* Check TX buffer and allow for a pending transfer to complete */
00306 
00307 #if defined( BSP_BCC_LEUART )
00308   while (!(BSP_BCC_LEUART->STATUS & LEUART_STATUS_TXBL)) ;
00309   BSP_BCC_LEUART->TXDATA = (uint32_t) data;
00310 #else
00311   while (!(BSP_BCC_USART->STATUS & USART_STATUS_TXBL)) ;
00312   BSP_BCC_USART->TXDATA = (uint32_t) data;
00313 #endif
00314 
00315   txByteCount++;
00316 }
